Articles.Content: We all love Playing KSP, and at the same time the Devs. are very busy on 0.20 and keeping us updated with the blogs, but have not had time for a Dev. Stream for a little while. For those of you who miss the KerbalSP stream and can't deal with it I have a temporary fix, I and many others have twitch channels, and we live stream KSP and many other games(DUH! that's what twitch.tv is for!), Oh but stop by my channel first http://www.twitch.tv/ravis788

The main reason there hasn't been a stream is often because most of the changes being made to KSP are behind the scenes, code stuff. I'm sure the vast majority of the community would get bored listening to that. And you can't really show off code if it isn't finished. That, and I'm sure the dev and community team has been busy catering to the forums.
...thats why more ppl should stream, that was my point.
